ageAcquisitionType: How do you want to measure the equipment usage time ?
ageAcquisitionTypeTooltip: Equipment maintenance application needs to know the equipment usage time to alert you when a task has to be performed. 3 different ways exist to define the equipment usage time. The most straightforward is to use the current time. Another one is to input manually this time in the application. The last method, the most accurate and automatic is to use a usage time tracker that will publish the usage time online.
ageToolTip: Amount of time in hour the equipment was used.
ageUrlToolTip: Url allowing to get the equipment usage time in hour.
